W3JsRtzPFFH5Xso0r6uoNQ.text: It's great.  Good food at great prices, the service is the best feature. Family run and super friendly. They know me by name, and occasionally, as I pop-in for a take away after my late shift at work, they give me a free beer for my returned custom. So nice. They have great offers on three course sit-in menu.. something like 8.95 Sun to Thur.  It's shut on Mondays, but everyone deserves a rest after all their hard work.

Yv6V6sZc1w-vOtRbC9V28w.text: Although this place doesn't look like much from the outside, they do some pretty tasty food. The duck in plum sauce is super yummy and although we only placed a small order (two main meals and a soft noodle to share) they gave us free prawn crackers.
